welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Voreppe, a picturesque town nestled in the French Alps. Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of our city, known for its stunning landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Voreppe has to offer. Bon voyage!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alpe D Huez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Alpe D Huez Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
